		<title>'Grey's Anatomy' Recap: Meredith Hooks Up With Her Coworker, Plus Two People Propose Marriage</title>
		<link rel="alternative" href="http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/greys-anatomy-meredith-kisses-coworker-two-people-propose-w206343"/>
		<updated>1969-12-31T19:00:00Z</updated>
		<published>2016-05-12T23:38:00Z</published>
		<id>http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/greys-anatomy-meredith-kisses-coworker-two-people-propose-w206343</id>
		<summary type="text">In Grey's Anatomy's Thursday, May 12, episode, Meredith finally heated things up with a hunky coworker, and two other characters popped the question — read Us Weekly's recap</summary>
		<content type="html"><p>The heart is a lonely hunter &#x2014; and sometimes that hunter is out for blood. On the Thursday, May 12, episode of <i>Grey&apos;s Anatomy</i>, it seemed that love was in the air, complicating things. Setting out to show Amelia (<b>Caterina Scorsone</b>) he was changing his ways, Owen (<b>Kevin McKidd</b>) traded in his trailer for a house and asked his girlfriend to help him pick out furniture. This sparked a discussion of whether each of them would ever consider getting married again, with both of them confirming they would. It&apos;s probably worth noting that they were operating at the time this hypothetical conversation about their future was taking place. </p><p></p><wm:embed type="inset" id="1"></wm:embed><p><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">They were pretty much the only ones on an upswing, though. <a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/greys-anatomy-fans-react-to-arizona-callies-custody-ruling-w205576">The situation confronting</a> Callie (</span><b style="line-height: 1.42857;"><a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/celebrities/sara-ramirez">Sara Ramirez</a></b><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">), Penny (</span><b style="line-height: 1.42857;">Samantha Sloyan</b><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">) and Arizona (</span><b style="line-height: 1.42857;"><a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/celebrities/jessica-capshaw">Jessica Capshaw</a></b><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">) went from bad to worse, and the tension between rocker Kyle (</span><b style="line-height: 1.42857;">Wilmer Valderrama</b><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">) and Stephanie (</span><b style="line-height: 1.42857;">Jerrika Hinton</b><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">) skyrocketed as his health continued to deteriorate.</span><br></p><p></p><wm:embed type="inset" id="2"></wm:embed><p><b style="line-height: 1.42857;">A Penny for Your Thoughts</b><br></p><p>Recognizing how upset Callie was, Penny tried her best to smooth things over, but Callie wasn&apos;t having it. When Penny offered to postpone leaving for her fellowship until their relationship was a bit better, Callie decided it was pointless. &quot;We both know how this ends,&quot; she sighed, noting that things &quot;taper off&quot; when people try long distance. &quot;I am stuck here Penny,&quot; Callie snapped. &quot;I am stuck and there is no good solution!&quot; </p><p></p><wm:embed type="inset" id="3"></wm:embed><p><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">When Penny asked if Callie was breaking up with her, she got her answer, and that answer was yes. &quot;Maybe we should just call it now,&quot; Callie reasoned. &quot;Yeah, we should. You should go.&quot; Penny wasted no time and Meredith walked in on her making her final plans to leave for the fellowship. Fortunately, Meredith (</span><b style="line-height: 1.42857;"><a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/celebrities/ellen-pompeo">Ellen Pompeo</a></b><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">) was in a more nurturing mood at that moment and promised Penny that life would go on, which she clearly appreciated.</span><br></p><p><b>Stephanie Can&apos;t Get Over Kyle</b></p><p>Even though she was the one who ended it, Stephanie was having a hard time respecting the boundaries of her new relationship with the rock star, who was back in the hospital with his tremor and other post-surgical complications. Though Stephanie was ordered to leave Kyle alone by Amelia (who was handling his care), Kyle&apos;s family (who clearly had no love for Stephanie) and Kyle himself (who was still smarting from their breakup), she couldn&apos;t help but stay all up in that business. When she disagreed with Amelia&apos;s plan of action to operate on Kyle yet again, Amelia laid down the law: &quot;I do not answer to you. This is my surgical plan. I am confident in my surgical plan. End of discussion.&quot;</p><p>Before Kyle&apos;s surgery, Stephanie went to see him and apologized for hurting him. This then spiraled into a conversation about their plans for once his treatment was over and he was on the mend. The tone quickly turned romantic. &quot;Don&apos;t say these things if you don&apos;t mean them,&quot; Kyle begged as Stephanie leaned in for a kiss. </p><p><b>Meredith Tells Off Amelia</b></p><p>When Amelia commented that she was feeling &quot;good&quot; about her plan for Kyle&apos;s surgery, something in Meredith just snapped. &quot;You think you&apos;re making all these choices and building this life when none of this is actually yours,&quot; the surgical chief began. &quot;You are living in my house, helping to take care of my children with my sister. You are marrying my best friend&apos;s ex. You are trying to do my husband&apos;s job. You know, you used to have humility, even a little anxiety, but now you even have his confidence! But why not? Because you&apos;ve taken over everything else.&quot; In case her point wasn&apos;t clear enough just yet, Mer added, &quot;Get your own life.&quot; </p><p><b>Kyle Dies on the Operating Table &#x2014; and Amelia Proposes to Owen</b></p><p>Unable to stay away, Stephanie watched as Amelia did her best to execute her plan to save Kyle. Unfortunately, shortly after beginning, it became clear that this plan was not going to work. Seeing Stephanie looking down from the viewing station above, Amelia ordered Jo (<b>Camilla Luddington</b>) to get Stephanie out of there, so she wasn&apos;t watching this unfold. </p><p>Jo sprinted as fast as she could, but by the time she reached Stephanie, Kyle was gone, and Amelia was calling his time of death. A stunned and heartbroken Stephanie roamed the hallways, and she didn&apos;t respond when Amelia tried to apologize. </p><p>Losing Kyle put Amelia in a reflective mood. As she laid eyes on Owen&apos;s new house for the first time, she commented, &quot;I don&apos;t want to waste our time.&quot; She went on to explain, &quot;I want a real life, and I want it with you.&quot; Owen asked her if she was asking him to marry her, and she said yes, she was.</p><p></p><wm:media type="photo" id="1"></wm:media><p><b>Alex Forces Jo to Answer His Marriage Proposal</b></p><p>But Amelia wasn&apos;t the only one making bold moves. After a long day at work (highlighted by the grandmother of one of his patients trying to set him up with her daughter), Alex (<b>Justin Chambers</b>) forced Jo to answer his marriage proposal. &quot;I am ready to be married, and I need to know when you&apos;re going to be ready,&quot; he said as she stared back like a deer caught in headlights. &quot;I want to be married to you, but I&apos;m done waiting, so I just need to know: Will you marry me?&quot;</p><wm:embed type="related"></wm:embed><p><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">Jo paused for all of two seconds to consider her answer. &quot;Alex, I can&apos;t.&quot; He then insisted that she could, but she was holding firm. &quot;I&apos;m so sorry,&quot; she added. &quot;But, no.&quot;</span><br></p><p>With that relationship seemingly imploding, Meredith and Riggs (<b>Martin Henderson</b>) got into an argument in the parking lot &#x2014; which somehow morphed into them passionately making out (and possibly more) in the backseat of her car.</p><p>Tell <i>Us</i>: Where are things headed for Meredith and Riggs? And was Jo right to turn Alex down? </p><p><i>Grey&apos;s Anatomy</i> airs on ABC Thursdays at 8 p.m. ET.&#xA0;</p><wm:html type="inset" id="1"></wm:html><p><br></p><p>This article originally appeared on www.usmagazine.com: <a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/greys-anatomy-meredith-kisses-coworker-two-people-propose-w206343">'Grey's Anatomy' Recap: Meredith Hooks Up With Her Coworker, Plus Two People Propose Marriage</a></p></content>
	</entry>

		<title>See Laverne Cox as Dr. Frank-N-Furter in 'Rocky Horror Picture Show': First Photo</title>
		<link rel="alternative" href="http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/see-laverne-cox-as-dr-frank-n-furter-in-rocky-horror-picture-show-w206288"/>
		<updated>1969-12-31T19:00:00Z</updated>
		<published>2016-05-12T23:04:00Z</published>
		<id>http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/see-laverne-cox-as-dr-frank-n-furter-in-rocky-horror-picture-show-w206288</id>
		<summary type="text">'Rocky Horror Picture Show' fans are getting their first look at Laverne Cox as Dr. Frank-N-Furter in Fox's upcoming TV remake — see the pic!</summary>
		<content type="html"><p></p><wm:media type="photo" id="1"></wm:media><p></p><p><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">Hot patootie! Fans are getting their first glimpse at Fox&apos;s<a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/christina-milian-joins-rocky-horror-picture-show-as-magenta-w163423"> upcoming<i> Rocky Horror Picture Show</i></a> update, a two-hour taped production featuring <b><a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/celebrities/laverne-cox">Laverne Cox</a></b> (Dr. Frank-N-Furter), <b>Christina Milian</b> (Magenta), <b>Victoria Justice</b> (Janet) and <b>Adam Lambert </b>(Eddie).</span><br></p><p></p><p></p><wm:embed type="inset" id="1"></wm:embed><p><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">The TV remake&apos;s pics were first posted by </span><i style="line-height: 1.42857;"><a href="http://www.ew.com/article/2016/05/12/rocky-horror-picture-show-laverne-cox">Entertainment Weekly</a></i><span style="line-height: 1.42857;"> and show Cox, 31, in the role originally portrayed by </span><b style="line-height: 1.42857;"><a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/tim-curry-is-returning-to-rocky-horror-picture-show-find-out-who-hell-play-w161809">Tim Curry</a></b><span style="line-height: 1.42857;"> in the 1975 cult film.</span></p><p></p><wm:embed type="inset" id="2"></wm:embed><p><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">Cox told</span><i style="line-height: 1.42857;"> EW</i><span style="line-height: 1.42857;"> that her costume might surprise viewers who are expecting a carbon copy of the 70-year-old</span><i style="line-height: 1.42857;"> Clue</i><span style="line-height: 1.42857;"> actor&apos;s.</span><br></p><p>&quot;I think we mix up the look more than they did in the original,&#x201D; the <i>Orange Is the New Black</i> actress said. &#x201C;It&#x2019;s inspired by the original, but it&#x2019;s really our own take. It&#x2019;s way more elaborate and couture.&quot;</p><p></p><wm:embed type="inset" id="3"></wm:embed><p><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">The project also stars </span><b style="line-height: 1.42857;">Reeve Carney</b><span style="line-height: 1.42857;"> (Riff Raff), </span><b style="line-height: 1.42857;">Annaleigh Ashford </b><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">(Columbia) and </span><b style="line-height: 1.42857;">Staz Nair </b><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">(Rocky). It follows the success of such recent TV musical events as NBC&apos;s </span><i style="line-height: 1.42857;">The Wiz Live!</i><span style="line-height: 1.42857;"> and Fox&apos;s </span><i style="line-height: 1.42857;">Grease: Live!</i><br></p><wm:embed type="related"></wm:embed><p><i style="line-height: 1.42857;">Rocky Horror</i><span style="line-height: 1.42857;"> airs on Fox this fall.&#xA0;</span><br></p><wm:html type="inset" id="1"></wm:html><p><br></p><p>This article originally appeared on www.usmagazine.com: <a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/see-laverne-cox-as-dr-frank-n-furter-in-rocky-horror-picture-show-w206288">See Laverne Cox as Dr. Frank-N-Furter in 'Rocky Horror Picture Show': First Photo</a></p></content>
	</entry>

		<title>ABC Cancels ‘Nashville’ After Four Seasons: See the Full List of This Season's Axed Network Shows</title>
		<link rel="alternative" href="http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/abc-cancels-nashville-see-list-of-this-seasons-axed-shows-w206344"/>
		<updated>1969-12-31T19:00:00Z</updated>
		<published>2016-05-12T20:16:00Z</published>
		<id>http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/abc-cancels-nashville-see-list-of-this-seasons-axed-shows-w206344</id>
		<summary type="text">The speakers are turning off for 'Nashville,' the soapy drama starring Connie Britton and Hayden Panettiere, with ABC canceling it on Thursday, May 12 — get the full list of this season's axed network shows</summary>
		<content type="html"><p><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">The day the music died. ABC announced on Thursday, May 12, that it has canceled the country music-themed primetime soap <i>Nashville</i> after four seasons.</span><br></p><p></p><wm:embed type="inset" id="1"></wm:embed><p><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">The news comes as a surprise, as </span><b style="line-height: 1.42857;">Marshall Herskovitz </b><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">and </span><b style="line-height: 1.42857;">Ed Zwick</b><span style="line-height: 1.42857;"> (</span><i style="line-height: 1.42857;">thirtysomething</i><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">) had been previously announced as new showrunners for the fifth season. The series finale is set to air Wednesday, May 25.</span><br></p><p>Nashville premiered in October 2012 and centers on rival music stars played by <b>Connie Britton</b> (Rayna Jaymes) and <b><a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/celebrities/hayden-panettiere">Hayden Panettiere</a></b> (Juliette Barnes). The <i>Heroes</i> alum, 26, who took a brief hiatus from the show earlier in the season, announced on May 12 that she is seeking additional <a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-body/news/hayden-panettiere-seeking-treatment-again-for-postpartum-depression-w206315">treatment for postpartum depression</a> after welcoming daughter <b>Kaya</b> with fianc&#xE9;<b> Wladimir Klitschko </b>in December 2014. </p><p></p><wm:embed type="inset" id="2"></wm:embed><p><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">This has been a dark day for TV producers ahead of next week&apos;s upfronts, with ABC in particular doling out <a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/abc-cancels-castle-amid-nathan-fillion-stana-katics-drama-w206347">pink slips right and left</a>. Among the network&apos;s other shows to get the ax on May 12 were</span><i style="line-height: 1.42857;"> <a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/abc-cancels-castle-amid-nathan-fillion-stana-katics-drama-w206347">Castle</a></i><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">, </span><i style="line-height: 1.42857;">The Muppets</i><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">, </span><i style="line-height: 1.42857;">The Family</i><span style="line-height: 1.42857;"> and</span><i style="line-height: 1.42857;"> Agent Carter.</i><br></p><p>The full list of series from the 2014&#x2013;2015 season that won&apos;t be returning to the five major networks (ABC, CBS, Fox, NBC and The CW) is below, including CBS&apos; <i>Mike &amp; Molly</i> and<i> The Good Wife </i>and Fox&apos;s<i> American Idol</i>.</p><p><i>Nashville </i>airs on ABC Wednesdays at 10 p.m. ET. </p><p>Tell <i>Us</i>: Did<i> Nashville </i>deserve another season?</p><p></p><wm:embed type="inset" id="3"></wm:embed><p><b style="line-height: 1.42857;">ABC</b><br></p><p><i>Agent Carter</i></p><p><i>The Astronaut Wives Club</i></p><p><i>Castle</i></p><p><i>The Family</i></p><p><i>Galavant</i></p><p><i>The Muppets</i></p><p><i>Rookie Blue</i></p><p><i>The Whispers</i></p><p><i>Nashville</i></p><p><i>Of Kings and Prophets</i></p><p><i>Wicked City</i></p><p><b>CBS</b></p><p><i>Angel From Hell</i></p><p><i>CSI: Cyber</i></p><p><i>Extant</i></p><p><i>The Good Wife</i></p><p><i>Mike and Molly</i></p><p><i>Person of Interest</i></p><p><i>Supergirl </i>(moving to The CW)</p><p><i>Under the Dome</i></p><wm:embed type="related"></wm:embed><p><b style="line-height: 1.42857;">Fox</b><br></p><p><i>American Idol</i></p><p><i>Bordertown</i></p><p><i>Cooper Barrett&apos;s Guide to Surviving Life</i></p><p><i>Grandfathered</i></p><p><i>The Grinder</i></p><p><i>Knock Knock Live</i></p><p><b>NBC</b></p><p><i>Hannibal</i></p><p><i>Mr. Robinson</i></p><p><i>Best Time Ever With Neil Patrick Harris</i></p><p><i>Heroes Reborn</i></p><p><b>The CW</b></p><p><i>America&apos;s Next Top Model</i></p><p><i>Beauty and the Beast</i></p><p><i>Containment</i></p><wm:html type="inset" id="1"></wm:html><p><br></p><p>This article originally appeared on www.usmagazine.com: <a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/abc-cancels-nashville-see-list-of-this-seasons-axed-shows-w206344">ABC Cancels ‘Nashville’ After Four Seasons: See the Full List of This Season's Axed Network Shows</a></p></content>

		<summary type="text">'Castle' is off the case, with ABC canceling the crime series on Thursday, May 12, following major turmoil for costars Nathan Fillion and Stana Katic — details!</summary>
		<content type="html"><p><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">The castle doors are closing for good. ABC announced on Thursday, May 12, that it has canceled crime procedural <i>Castle </i>after eight seasons, which comes on the heels of major turmoil for the series.</span><br></p><p></p><wm:embed type="inset" id="1"></wm:embed><p><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">The show, which stars </span><b style="line-height: 1.42857;"><a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/celebrities/nathan-fillion">Nathan Fillion</a></b><span style="line-height: 1.42857;"> as novelist Richard Castle and </span><b style="line-height: 1.42857;">Stana Katic </b><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">as detective Kate Beckett, premiered in March 2009. News broke last month that Katic, 38, would be exiting the show at the end of season 8, and </span><i style="line-height: 1.42857;">Us Weekly</i><span style="line-height: 1.42857;"> reported that there had been <a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/castles-stana-katic-nathan-fillion-feuding-attended-couples-counseling-w203196">major tension between the two leads</a> for years.</span><br></p><p></p><wm:embed type="inset" id="2"></wm:embed><p><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">A promo for the season 8 finale, which airs on Monday, May 16, <a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/castle-finale-promo-end-to-castle-becketts-love-story-w205927">teases a possible death</a>, with a villain saying that </span><i style="line-height: 1.42857;">Castle </i><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">and Beckett&apos;s love story &quot;ends in tragedy.&quot;</span><br></p><p></p><wm:embed type="inset" id="3"></wm:embed><p><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">A day after Katic&apos;s departure was announced, <a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/nathan-fillion-reacts-to-stana-katics-abrupt-castle-exit-w203276">Fillion tweeted</a>, &quot;</span><i style="line-height: 1.42857;">Castle</i><span style="line-height: 1.42857;"> has been one of the greatest joys of my creative life, and I hope the show continues on for years to come.&quot; The actor, 45, had recently signed a new deal to return for season 9 in case the network picked up the series.</span><br></p><p></p><wm:media type="photo" id="1"></wm:media><p></p><p>The stars have not yet reacted on social media to the cancellation.</p><p>The full list of series from the 2014&#x2013;2015 season that won&apos;t be returning to the five major networks (ABC, CBS, Fox, NBC and The CW) is below, including CBS&apos; <i>Mike &amp; Molly</i> and<i> <a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/good-wife-creators-explain-series-finale-ending-w205681">The Good Wife</a></i>, Fox&apos;s <i>American Idol </i>and <a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/abc-cancels-nashville-see-list-of-this-seasons-axed-shows-w206344">ABC&apos;s<i> Nashville</i></a><i></i>.<br></p><p><i>Castle</i>&apos;s final
